channel.title: What IP do I use while making a server?
channel.description: When I was reading the server tutorials I have heard of many different IPs.. I was wondering, when I portforward which one do I enter and how do I find it?

item.title: What IP do I use while making a server?
item.dc:creator: @sheercoldpvp sheercoldpvp
item.description:
@sheercoldpvp wrote:

use localhost 127.0.0.1 to connect if only you are wanting to connect to your server, therefore you can edit ect. while portforwarding is offline ect.

hope this helps

Read full topic
item.source: What IP do I use while making a server?

item.title: What IP do I use while making a server?
item.dc:creator: @mangalover51 mangalover51
item.description:
@mangalover51 wrote:

ok ok, first things first for vista:

1.click the start button
2.type cmd
3.then, type ipconfig into the black box that comes up when you type cmd, then write down the defualt gateway.
4.then go back to internet and type in the defualt gateway into the address bar
5. then you will get a thing where you have to type in the username and pass
the most common user and pass is username:admin password:admin

windows xp,windows 2000,etc:

1.click start
2.click run it’s right next to all programs
3. type cmd in the box that comes up
4.type ipconfig into the black box that comes up, then write down the defualt gateway.
5.then go back to internet and type in the defualt gateway into the address bar
6then you will get a thing where you have to type in the username and pass
the most common user and pass is username:admin password:admin

if you cannot find pass here are more… default passes

1.username::admin,password::password
2.username::password,password::password

and if none of thos worked either ask your perents if your that age about the pass and user they maybe set one on it

and if they don’t know reset the router/modem you use…it will set to the defualt password which will be one of thos above…

Read full topic
item.source: What IP do I use while making a server?

item.title: What IP do I use while making a server?
item.dc:creator: @death_t_d death t d
item.description:
@death_t_d wrote:

@deathschaos9 you are completely wrong! Defiance your default gateway is what you type into your internet explorer to access your router, the IP that you use to port forward can be found by doing this:
1: Run COMMAND PROMPT (CMD)
2:Type ipconfig
3:Under the first heading look for the sentence that says " IPv4 Address" the one next to it is the IP you should use to portforward!
If u can please REP ++!!!
Hope this helped!!!

Read full topic
item.source: What IP do I use while making a server?

item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

You can find it by clicking start, typing in cmd than typing in ipconfig

Its the default gateway
